code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Task(_ref){let{txt,onDelete}=_ref;const[style,setStyle]=useState("btn-success");const[input,setInput]=useState("Modifier");const[readonly,setReadOnly]=useState(true);const[txt1,setTxt1]=useState(txt);const handleModify=()=>{if(style==="btn-success"){setInput("Submit");setStyle("btn-warning");setReadOnly(false);setTxt1(txt);}else{setInput("Modifier");setStyle("btn-success");setReadOnly(true);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:txt1,className:"form-control",readOnly:readonly,onChange:e=>setTxt1(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",onClick:onDelete,className:"btn btn-danger mx-2 mt-3",children:"Supprimer"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",onClick:handleModify,className:"btn ".concat(style," mt-3"),children:input})]});}
